Title romanisation: Theg-pa chen-po lam-gyi sgrub-thabs yi-ger bsdus-ba

author: Mar-me-mdsad ye-śes
Title romanisation: Theg-pa chen-poḥi lam-gyi sgrub-thabs śin-tu bsdus-pa

author: Mar-me-mdsad ye-śes
Title romanisation: Raṅ-gi bya-baḥi rim-pa bskul-ba daṅ-bcas-pa yi-ger bris-pa

author: Mar-me-mdsad ye-śes
Title romanisation: Mi dge-ba bcuḥi las-kyi lam bstan-pa

author: Mar-me-mdsad ye-śes
Title romanisation: Ḥjig-rten las ḥdas-paḥi yan-lag bdun-paḥi cho-ga

author: Mar-me-mdsad ye-śes
Title romanisation: Kha-ton daṅ glegs-bam klog-paḥi sṅon-du-ḥgro-baḥi cho-ga

author: Mar-me-mdsad ye-śes
Chinese translation: 波羅蜜多乘[專*瓦]佛造作儀軌

author: Dgra-las rgyal-ba gsaṅ-ba
Title romanisation: Sems rin-po-che rnam-par sbyaṅ-baḥi rim-pa shes-bya-baḥi phrin-yig

author: Don-yod ḥchar
Title romanisation: Dri-ma med-paḥi dris-lan rin-po cheḥi phreṅ-ba shes-bya-ba

author: Spyan-ras-gzigs dbaṅ-phyug
Chinese translation: 聖觀自在授與比丘善明童子書翰
Title romanisation: Ḥphags-pa spyan-ras-gzigs dbaṅ-phyug gis dge-sloṅ rab-gsal gshon-nur la spriṅs-paḥi phrin-yig

author: Dpaḥ-bo (Śūra)
Title romanisation: Legs-par bśad-paḥi rin-po cheḥi za-ma-tog lta-buḥi gtam

author: Rta dbyaṅs
Chinese translation: 真諦菩提心修習次第書
Title romanisation: Don-dam-pa byaṅ-chub-kyi-sems sgom-paḥi rim-pa yi-ger bris-pa

author: Rta dbyaṅs
Chinese translation: 俗諦菩提心修習優波提舍書
Title romanisation: Kun-rdsob byaṅ-chub-kyi sems sgom-paḥi man-ṅag yi-ger bris-pa

author: Dbyig-gñen
Title romanisation: Ḥdod-paḥi yon-tan rnam-pa ṅaḥi ñes-dmigs bśad-pa

Chinese translation: 聖廣大分別經中罪過懺悔成就儀軌
Title romanisation: Ḥphags-pa rtogs-pa chen-po yoṅs-su rgyas-paḥi mdo-sdeḥi sdig-pa bśags-pa daṅ sgrub-paḥi cho-ga

author: Shi-ba lha (Śāntideva)
Chinese translation: 如來心百字守護助伴罪過懺悔儀軌
Title romanisation: De-bshin-gśegs-paḥi sñiṅ-po yi-ge brgya-paḥi sruṅ-ba daṅ sdig-pa bśags-paḥi cho-ga

author: Ye-śes grags-pa
Chinese translation: 波羅蜜多乘修習次第優波提舍

author: Rin-chen ḥbyuṅ-gnas shi-ba
Chinese translation: 般若波羅蜜多修習優波提舍

author: Ye-śes zla-ba
Chinese translation: 瑜伽行修習義略攝說示
Title romanisation: Rnal-ḥbyor spyod-paḥi sgom-paḥi don mdor-bsdus te bstan-pa

author: Karma bstan-paḥi ñin-byed gtsug-lag chos-kyi snaṅ-ba
Chinese translation: 善逝語雪有（國）語翻上集悉印刻成就緣起開始譚智者信仰薰陀開華月光王子寶座
Title romanisation: Bde-bar-gśegs-paḥi bkaḥ gaṅs-can-gyi brdas draṅs-baḥi phyi-moḥi tshogs ji-sñed-pa par-du bsgrub-paḥi tshul-las ñe-bar brtsams-paḥi gtam bzaṅ-po blo-ldan mos-paḥi kunda yoṅs-su kha bye-baḥi zla-ḥod gshon-nuḥi ḥkhri-śiṅ

author: Tshul-khrims rin-chen dbyaṅs-can sñems-paḥi laṅ-tshoḥi sde
Chinese translation: 大一切智者日種語阿含義總別密意註解論雪有（有）國語譯法施相續不斷希神變上（集）究竟福劫大雲聚凝緣起開始譚希水寶增新月
Title romanisation: Thams-cad mkhyen-pa chen-po ñi-maḥi gñen-gyi bkaḥ-luṅ spyi daṅ bye-brag-gi dgoṅs don rnam-par ḥgrel-paḥi bstan-bcos gaṅs-can-paḥi skad-du ḥgyur-ro ḥtshal-gyi chos-sbyin rgyun mi ḥchad-paḥi ṅo-mtshar ḥphrul-gyi phyi-mo rdsogs-ldan bskal-baḥi bsod-nams-kyi sprin phuṅ rgyas-par dkrigs-paḥi tshul-las brtsams-paḥi gtam ṅo-mtshar chu gter ḥphel-baḥi zla-ba gsar-ba
